No more seals can be applied. Deliver the journal to Khloe Aliapoh to receive your reward.
One or more lines of seals have been completed. Deliver the journal to Khloe Aliapoh to receive your reward or continue adventuring to add more seals.
Second Chance points can be used to increase your chances of completing lines.
Select a completed duty to receive a seal.
Complete a task to receive a seal.

Second Chance points can be earned by completing select duties with party members who are new to the duty.
Restores the status of a completed duty to incomplete, while rendering the status of an incomplete duty to complete.

Changes the location of all seals. Only available
when current seal count is between three and seven.
※Second Chance points can be carried over to the next week's challenge.
Select a completed duty to be rendered incomplete.
Shuffle the positions of your seals?
Render a previously completed duty incomplete?
Warning: You will not be able to receive all the Allagan tomestones. Do you still wish to proceed?
This head is effective in spearing small prey.
This head is effective in spearing medium prey.
This head is effective in spearing large prey.
Select from where you wish to resume the duty.

<If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),5678))>Pledge your allegiance to a Grand Company.
Allegiance can be changed at a later date.<Else/>Select the path you wish to take through the main scenario. The quest you did not select can be played at a later time.</If>
I understand what I must do.

This currency is no longer valid. For a limited time, certain NPCs will be able to exchange it for valid currency.
Select currencies to display on HUD.

The above currency will display on the HUD by default. Right-click on the currency icon to cycle through currencies in your rotation. The order in which they display can be changed via the arrows to the right of each rotation slot.
Switch Job Gauge to Simple Mode
Restore settings and placement defaults for current HUD element?

※Exit group pose to apply changes.
※Changes inapplicable on select NPCs.

Settings to be saved:
・Position, zoom, angle of view, and roll angle

Settings to be saved:
・Lightings 1-3 (position, type, and color)
・Character lightning
・Manual brightness settings

Character Position:
Settings are saved relative to your character's orientation. When loaded, settings will be adjusted based on the direction your character is facing.

Camera Position:
Settings are saved relative to the camera's
current position. When loaded, settings
will be adjusted irrespective of the
direction your character is facing.

Settings can be saved based on the
direction your character is facing or
the current orientation of the camera.
Data containing system information for FINAL FANTASY XIV.

There is not enough space on your hard drive to create character config data.
An additional <Value>IntegerParameter(1)</Value> <switch(IntegerParameter(2),bytes,KB,MB,GB)> of space is required.
Open the hard drive utility?

An additional <Value>IntegerParameter(1)</Value> <switch(IntegerParameter(2),bytes,KB,MB,GB)> of space is required.
Character config data is corrupt. Please exit the game and delete character config data.
Character config data is corrupt. Loading backup data.

Thank you for your report. A representative will review it shortly. Notification of a reply will be displayed in Recent Replies & Notices located under the Information tab. Depending on the issue, the representative may request further information. All queries and replies can be viewed under the History tab.
